note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized). Due to the widespread underdiagnosis, these estimates use a combination of sources, including medical and national records, epidemiological data, survey data, and meta-regression models.
title: Share of population with mental health disorders
subtitle: This includes depression, anxiety, bipolar, eating disorders, and schizophrenia.
